EmailTemplate.name: TIDS_CR_Approved_Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} | Changes Processed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TIDS Changes Processed
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Please be advised that the changes reported for TIDS {!Case.IFAP_Agent_Code__c} have now been processed.
Change(s) Reported: {!Case.Subject}
Supporting Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Request Status: {!Case.Status}
These changes will be reflected in the IATA Agency List which industry suppliers reply upon.
Please take a moment to log in to the TIDS Service via the IATA Customer Portal to review your agency details and ensure the information is correct.
Thank you for choosing TIDS, IATA's program for standard identification of non-accredited travel sellers.
The IATA TIDS Team
You Might Also Need
IATA Travel & Tourism Training
IATA Travel Agent ID Card
IATA Timatic Solutions
This email was sent to {!Contact.Email}. Please do not reply to this email as this address is not monitored. International Air Transport Association. 800 Square Victoria, Montreal, H4Z 1M1, Canada Â© Copyright 2020. All rights reserved. https://www.iata.org
